mapper.update: update CUSTOMER_SP set beizhu=#{beizhu},sptime=#{sptime},jlyy=#{jlyys},spje=#{spje},splv=#{splv},status=#{status},spqx=#{spqx} where capid=#{capid} and spuserid=#{spuserid}
mapper.select: select distinct(capid) as capid from CUSTOMER_SP where status!='0'
select distinct(capid) as capid from CUSTOMER_SP where status!='0'
select spuserid as spuserid from CUSTOMER_SP where capid=#{id}

select c.spuserid as spuserid, c.pid as pid ,c.cid as cid, c.beizhu as beizhu,c.sptime as sptime,c.jlyy as jlyys,c.time as time,c.spje as spje,c.splv as splv,c.status as status,c.spqx as spqx from CUSTOMER_SP c, (select status as status,id as id from CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO where id=#{capid})cc where c.capid=#{capid} and c.capid=cc.id

select c.spuserid as spuserid, c.pid as pid ,c.cid as cid, c.beizhu as beizhu,c.sptime as sptime,c.jlyy as jlyys,c.time as time,c.spje as spje,c.splv as splv,c.status as status,c.spqx as spqx from CUSTOMER_SP c, (select status as status,id as id from CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO where id=#{capid})cc where c.capid=#{capid} and c.capid=cc.id and cc.status='audit'
select display_name as name1 from sys_user where id=#{id}
